short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that finds similar news articles to the one you're on, summarises and finds key coverage differences

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wondered if the news article you're reading is giving you the full story?

Install NewsCord and use it whenever you're on a news article and want to find out what other news sources are covering

- NewsCord will summarise your article as well as articles from other sources
- Create a condensed version of the articles that gives you all the perspectives
- Point out key contradictions and differences in tone and narrative between the news sources

See more news comparisons, media bias and the latest news for the topic you're reading by clicking the topic button at the top of the extension popup
